mapper.select: /* selectProjEvalDtl */ SELECT D.YEAR_EVAL_ID , D.YEAR_END_GB , D.YEAR_EVAL_GB , D.YEAR_END_EVAL_GB , D.YEAR_EVAL_FILE_GROUP , A.PROJ_YEAR_ID , A.PROJ_ID , A.PROJ_YEAR_GB , A.PROJ_STEP_GB , A.PROJ_RECPT_NO , A.PROJ_TYPE_CD , A.RND_GB , A.TOT_COST , A.GOV_COST , A.CASH , A.STOCK , A.TECH_CLS_CD1 , (SELECT D.TCLS_NM FROM PTL_TECH_CLS_CODE D WHERE D.TCLS_ID = B.TECH_CLS_CD1 ) AS TECH_CLS_NM1 , A.WEIGHT1 , A.TECH_CLS_CD2 , (SELECT D.TCLS_NM FROM PTL_TECH_CLS_CODE D WHERE D.TCLS_ID = B.TECH_CLS_CD2 ) AS TECH_CLS_NM2 , A.WEIGHT2 , A.TECH_CLS_CD3 , (SELECT D.TCLS_NM FROM PTL_TECH_CLS_CODE D WHERE D.TCLS_ID = B.TECH_CLS_CD3 ) AS TECH_CLS_NM3 , A.WEIGHT3 , A.SECURTY_LEVL_CD , A.PROJ_NM_KOR , A.PROJ_NM_ENG , DATE_FORMAT(A.CUR_STRTDT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CUR_STRTDT , DATE_FORMAT(A.CUR_ENDDT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CUR_ENDDT , A.CREATE_ID , FN_USER_KEY_INFO(A.CREATE_ID , 'NM') AS USERNAME , DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_DTTM , A.YEAR_FILE_GROUP , B.LEAD_ORG_CD , B.AGMT_GB , DATE_FORMAT(B.AGMT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS AGMT_DT , (SELECT D.ORG_NM FROM PTL_ORG_MNG D WHERE D.ORG_ID = B.LEAD_ORG_CD ) AS ORG_NM , (SELECT D.ORG_CRM_NO FROM PTL_ORG_MNG D WHERE D.ORG_ID = B.LEAD_ORG_CD ) AS ORG_CRM_NO , (SELECT D.ORG_ADDRESS FROM PTL_ORG_MNG D WHERE D.ORG_ID = B.LEAD_ORG_CD ) AS ORG_ADDRESS , C.ANN_ID , C.ANN_NO , C.ANN_DT , C.ANN_NM , C.DEPT_ORG , C.DDCT_ORG , C.FILE_GROUP FROM PTL_PROJECT_YEAR A LEFT JOIN PTL_PROJECT B ON A.PROJ_ID = B.PROJ_ID LEFT JOIN PTL_ANNOUNCE C ON B.ANN_ID = C.ANN_ID LEFT JOIN PTL_YEAR_EVALUATE D ON A.PROJ_YEAR_ID = D.PROJ_YEAR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEL_YN ='N' AND B.AGMT_GB = '1' AND A.PROJ_YEAR_ID = #{proj_year_id}
